Comments_List: I learned to think about biological systems in a more quantitative way, and I developed skills to model these systems.

I think the course can be structured better. I think the lectures were hard to look back at because they were mostly figures and diagrams. I think that having a little more text and some summary points would be helpful. I also think that the problem sets were not worded well sometimes, so it was very unclear what was meant. I think some examples should be incorporated into class.
